affects:
ABILITY: Unit Target
AFFECTS: Enemy Units
DAMAGE: Magical
attrib:
MINIMUM STUN: 1 / 1 / 1 / 2
MAXIMUM STUN: 2 / 3 / 4 / 4
MINIMUM DAMAGE: 1 / 50 / 75 / 100
MAXIMUM DAMAGE: 200 / 225 / 250 / 275
cmb:
MANA COST: 140/140/140/140
COOLDOWN: 10
desc: Throws a mysterious bolt of energy at the target unit. It stuns for a random duration and deals random damage.
lore: Even Chaos Knight cannot predict this manifest of unholy energy.
name: chaos_knight_chaos_bolt

attrib:
RANGE: 550 / 600 / 650 / 700
BONUS DAMAGE: 60 / 80 / 100 / 120
BONUS DURATION: 1.2
cmb:
MANA COST: 50
COOLDOWN: 24/18/12/6
desc: Teleports you, any images you have and the target unit to a random point along the line between the two of you. Gives you bonus attack damage for one attack.
notes: Chaos Knight and the target unit are made to face each other, and Chaos Knight and his illusions are issued an attack order against the target.
lore: Armageddon rides between the planes, bringing Chaos Knight to his victim wherever he may hide.
name: chaos_knight_reality_rift

desc: Chaos Knight's mojo gives him a chance to deal bonus damage.
lore: Chaos Knight's unwieldy power bludgeons those who stand before him, crushing the thickest of armors.
name: chaos_knight_chaos_strike

cmb:
MANA COST: 125/200/275
COOLDOWN: 140
desc: Summons several copies of the Chaos Knight from alternate dimensions. The illusions deal full damage, but take double damage.50% chance to create one extra illusion when cast.
notes:
Removes most negative buffs from Chaos Knight.
Chaos Knight is invulnerable for 0.5 seconds when casting, allowing him to dodge stuns and damage.
lore: Drawing on his battles fought across many worlds and many times, phantasms of the Chaos Knight rise up to quell all who oppose him.
name: chaos_knight_phantasm
